text: Total dive. Sticky floors, smells like bleach. Best night of my life.
Don't come here if you want fancy cocktails. Cash only. Perfect.
It's a hole in the wall. The bathroom is scary. I love it.
Bartender ignored me for 10 minutes. 10/10 experience.
Rude staff kicked us out for no reason.
It's okay for a quick beer. Nothing special.
Cheap drinks but way too loud.
